TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpCacheVaryByHeaders extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供類型安全方式來設定 屬性。

span.span: Provides a type-safe way to set the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會識別哪一個 ASP.NET 用來唯一識別回應的變異有多個資源的快取的回應時的要求標頭參數。The property identifies which request header parameters ASP.NET uses to uniquely identify a variation of the response when there are multiple cached responses for a resource. 當回應則取決於一組用戶端的輸入，例如標頭或參數時，這非常有用。This is useful when a response depends on a set of client inputs, such as headers or parameters. HTTP 快取控制標頭，不直接相關，但可協助確保用戶端或 proxy 因指定的標頭。The is not directly related to HTTP cache-control headers, but helps ensure that a client or proxy varies by the specified headers. 如需有關`VaryByHeaders`，請參閱 RFC 2616： 超文字傳輸通訊協定-HTTP/1.1 中，用於[World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 網站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information about `VaryByHeaders`, see RFC 2616: Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1, available on the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). 請參閱節 14 中，「 標頭欄位定義 」 的完整詳細資料。See section 14, "Header Field Definitions", for complete details.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AcceptTypes { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出 ASP.NET 輸出快取的快取回應是否依 HTTP 標頭而有所不同，並且將此值附加至外送 HTTP 標頭。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the ASP.NET output cache varies the cached responses by the HTTP header, and appends it to the out-going HTTP header.

value.span: 當 ASP.NET 輸出快取依 標頭有所不同，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: when the ASP.NET output cache varies by the header; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Vary`標頭指出伺服器有不同的回應的要求標頭欄位`Accept`欄位，並指定 伺服器選取媒體類型的用戶端接受的回應。The `Vary` header indicates the request-header fields that the server varies the response by the `Accept` field and specifies that the server selects the response based on the media types acceptable to the client. 如需有關 HTTP 標頭的詳細資訊，請參閱 RFC 2616： 超文字傳輸通訊協定-HTTP/1.1 中，用於[World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 網站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information on HTTP headers, see RFC 2616: Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1, available on the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). 請參閱節 14 中，「 標頭欄位定義 」 的完整詳細資料。See section 14, "Header Field Definitions", for complete details. ## Examples 這個程式碼範例示範如何執行某些動作才屬性是`true`。This following code example demonstrates how some action is performed only if the property is `true`. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.AcceptTypes Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.AcceptTypes Example/cs/source.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.AcceptTypes Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.AcceptTypes Example/vb/source.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance string[] GetHeaders() cil managed

summary.span: 取得值的陣列，這些值會指定要用來改變快取的 HTTP 標頭。

span.span: Gets an array of values which specify the HTTP headers to be used for varying the cache.

returns.span: 值的陣列，其中包含用來改變快取的 HTTP 標頭。

span.span: An array of values which contain the HTTP headers for varying the cache.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool this[string header] { get; set; }
Default Public Property Item(header As String) As Boolean
public: property bool default[System::String ^] { bool get(System::String ^ header); void set(System::String ^ header, bool value); };

span.span: The name of the custom header.

summary.span: 取得或設定自訂標頭欄位，ASP.NET 輸出快取的快取回應會依此自訂標頭欄位而有所不同，並且將此自訂標頭欄位附加至外送 HTTP 標頭。

span.span: Gets or sets a custom header field that the ASP.NET output cache varies the cached responses by, and appends it to the out-going HTTP header.

value.span: ASP.NET 輸出快取因指定的自訂欄位。否則， 。

span.span: when the ASP.NET output cache varies by the specified custom field; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Vary`標頭指出伺服器有不同的回應的要求標頭欄位。The `Vary` header indicates the request-header fields that the server varies the response by. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 RFC 2616： 超文字傳輸通訊協定-HTTP/1.1 中，用於[World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 網站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information, see RFC 2616: Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1, available on the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). 請參閱節 14 中，「 標頭欄位定義 」 的完整詳細資料。See section 14, "Header Field Definitions", for complete details. 方法會在內部呼叫，如果指定`header`值 \* （星號）。The method is called internally if the specified `header` has the value \* (an asterisk).

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetHeaders(string[] headers) cil managed

param.name: headers
param.span: 值的陣列，其中包含用來改變快取的 HTTP 標頭。

span.span: An array of values which contain the HTTP headers for varying the cache.

summary.span: 設定值的陣列，這些值會指定要用來改變快取的 HTTP 標頭。

span.span: Sets an array of values which specify the HTTP headers to be used for varying the cache.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UserAgent { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出 ASP.NET 輸出快取的快取回應是否依 標頭而有所不同，並且將此值附加至外送 HTTP 標頭。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the ASP.NET output cache varies the cached responses by the header, and appends it to the out-going HTTP header.

value.span: 當 ASP.NET 輸出快取依 標頭而有所不同，並將它附加至傳送給用戶端的 HTTP 標頭時，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: when the ASP.NET output cache varies by the header, and adds it to the HTTP header sent to the client; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Vary`標頭指出伺服器用來判斷用戶端要求回應中傳送的多個快取的回應的要求標頭欄位。The `Vary` header indicates the request-header fields that the server uses to determine which of multiple cached responses is sent in response to a client request. `User-Agent`欄位指定伺服器選取根據用戶端使用者代理程式類型的回應。The `User-Agent` field specifies that the server selects the response based on the client's user-agent type. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 RFC 2616： 超文字傳輸通訊協定-HTTP/1.1 中，用於[World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 網站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information, see RFC 2616: Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1, available on the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). 請參閱節 14 中，「 標頭欄位定義 」 的完整詳細資料。See section 14, "Header Field Definitions", for complete details. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何執行某些動作才屬性是`true`。The following code example demonstrates how some action is performed only if the property is `true`. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.UserAgent Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.UserAgent Example/cs/source.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.UserAgent Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.UserAgent Example/vb/source.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UserCharSet { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出 ASP.NET 輸出快取的快取回應是否依 標頭而有所不同，並且將此值附加至外送 HTTP 標頭。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the ASP.NET output cache varies the cached responses by the header, and appends it to the out-going HTTP header.

value.span: 當 ASP.NET 輸出快取依 標頭而有所不同，並將它附加至傳送給用戶端的 HTTP 標頭時，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: when the ASP.NET output cache varies by the header and adds it to the HTTP header sent to the client; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Vary`標頭指出伺服器用來判斷用戶端要求回應中傳送的多個快取的回應的要求標頭欄位。The `Vary` header indicates the request-header fields that the server uses to determine which of multiple cached responses is sent in response to a client request. `Accept-CharSet`欄位指定伺服器選取回應根據用戶端的字元集。The `Accept-CharSet` field specifies that the server selects the response based on the client's character set. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 RFC 2616： 超文字傳輸通訊協定-HTTP/1.1 中，用於[World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 網站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information, see RFC 2616: Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1, available on the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). 請參閱節 14 中，「 標頭欄位定義 」 的完整詳細資料。See section 14, "Header Field Definitions", for complete details. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何執行某些動作才屬性是`true`。The following code example demonstrates how some action is performed only if the property is `true`. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.UserCharSet Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.UserCharSet Example/cs/source.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.UserCharSet Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.UserCharSet Example/vb/source.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UserLanguage { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出 ASP.NET 輸出快取的快取回應是否依 標頭而有所不同，並且將此值附加至外送 HTTP 標頭。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the ASP.NET output cache varies the cached responses by the header, and appends it to the out-going HTTP header.

value.span: 當 ASP.NET 輸出快取依 標頭而有所不同，並將它附加至傳送給用戶端的 HTTP 標頭時，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: when ASP.NET output cache varies by the header and adds it to the HTTP header sent to the client; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Vary`標頭指出伺服器用來判斷用戶端要求回應中傳送的多個快取的回應的要求標頭欄位。The `Vary` header indicates the request-header fields that the server uses to determine which of multiple cached responses is sent in response to a client request. `Accept-Language`欄位指定伺服器選取根據語言的用戶端接受的回應。The `Accept-Language` field specifies that the server selects the response based on languages acceptable to the client. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 RFC 2616： 超文字傳輸通訊協定-HTTP/1.1 中，用於[World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 網站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information, see RFC 2616: Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1, available on the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). 請參閱節 14 中，「 標頭欄位定義 」 的完整詳細資料。See section 14, "Header Field Definitions", for complete details. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何執行某些動作才屬性是`true`。The following code example demonstrates how some action is performed only if the property is `true`. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.UserLanguage Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.UserLanguage Example/cs/source.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.UserLanguage Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.UserLanguage Example/vb/source.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void VaryByUnspecifiedParameters() cil managed

summary.span: 造成 ASP.NET 依所有標頭值而有所不同，並將 HTTP 標頭設為 \* 值 (星號)。

span.span: Causes ASP.NET to vary by all header values and sets the HTTP header to the value \* (an asterisk).

summary.span: 所有其他 標頭資訊都會被捨棄。

span.span: All other header information to be dropped.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Vary`標頭指出伺服器用來判斷用戶端要求回應中傳送的多個快取的回應的要求標頭欄位。The `Vary` header indicates the request-header fields that the server uses to determine which of multiple cached responses is sent in response to a client request. \* 值會指定伺服器選取根據參數要求標頭 （例如，用戶端的網路位址） 中未指定的回應。The \* value specifies that the server selects the response based on parameters not specified in request headers (for example, the network address of the client). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 RFC 2616： 超文字傳輸通訊協定-HTTP/1.1 中，用於[World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 網站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information, see RFC 2616: Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1, available on the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). 請參閱節 14 中，「 標頭欄位定義 」 的完整詳細資料。See section 14, "Header Field Definitions", for complete details.
